properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER TOWING
   5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. IN PROGRESS ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      04-30N 049-50W AND 04-20N 049-45W.
   B. 09 MAY ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      04-47N 048-36W AND 05-48N 048-21W.
   C. 10 MAY ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      04-24N 049-48W AND 04-16N 049-41W.
   D. 11 MAY ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      05-48N 048-21W AND 05-48N 048-13W.
   E. 12 MAY ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      04-16N 049-41W AND 04-16N 049-34W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 13 MAY.
